subject: Predictions and Astral projection information
author: hermes_559
full_text:
Hello, I am new.

I have found a site:  www.hercolubus.tv   that offers a free book with predictions about Earth changes.

It has also information about Astral projection to research the after death world.

This book also quotes that new illnesses without cure are going to appear.

The author died after finish it.

I think it is interesting.

Greetings

Hermes
